articles.title: Amalija Knavs, mother of Melania Trump, dies at 78 - POLITICO
articles.description: The Slovenian immigrant became an American citizen during her son-in-law's presidency.
articles.content: Melania herself wrote on X: Amalija Knavs was a strong woman who always carried herself with grace, warmth, and dignity. She was entirely devoted to her husband, daughters, grandson, and son-in-law. … [+1676 chars]

articles.title: FULL MATCH – Oba Femi cashes in after Dragon Lee vs. Lexis King: WWE NXT, Jan. 9, 2024 - WWE
articles.description: Oba Femi cashes in his Breakout Tournament contract on Dragon Lee after the champion defended the North American Title against the foul-mouthed Lexis King. C...
